__e: "Don't let them see your tears," he told me.
Personally, I think it's all just New Age crap, but from your tear-filled, puppy dog eyes, I think I've made my point.
You and I, my darling, we're going to cry together, and I'm going to drink your tears.
If you hit him square in the nose he'll be blinded by his tears and choke on his own blood.
And that's when you've just got to pull up your socks, wipe your tears and move on.
I just hoped that in every nerve ending and with every tear and every smile that we could give between the two of us, that he would understand that I loved him, and I was there.
